bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a li ji 痢疾 , free-flux illness ailment, which is first red and then white and lasts without healing for many years. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 25 quoting Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 : 凡病下，應 先下白後下赤，若先下赤後下白，為腸蠱 , “Whenever one suffers from discharge, the normal course is that the discharge is white first and red afterwards. If the discharge is red first and white afterwards, then this is intestinal gu ”.
